Package jdraw.std

Class StdSelectionTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdraw.std.StdSelectionTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawTool
    public class StdSelectionTool
extends Object
implements DrawTool
    The default tool is used for figure selection and general manipulation of one or more figures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StdSelectionTool​(DrawView aView, DrawContext aContext)
      This tool enables selection behavior in the given view.

        This tool enables selection behavior in the given view.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Description copied from interface: DrawTool
        Activates the tool for the given view. This method is called whenever the user switches to this tool. Use this method to reinitialize a tool.
        Specified by:
        activate in interface DrawTool

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Description copied from interface: DrawTool
        Deactivates the tool. This method is called whenever the user switches to another tool. Use this method to do some clean-up when the tool is switched. Subclasses should always call super.deactivate().
        Specified by:
        deactivate in interface DrawTool

      • getCursor

        public Cursor getCursor()
        Description copied from interface: DrawTool
        Returns the cursor to be used by the draw view if this draw tool is set.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        cursor for this draw tool.
